scripts.webp:png: for file in assets/img/**/*.png; do ./node_modules/.bin/cwebp -lossless -q 80 $file -o source/$file.webp -short; done;
scripts.webp:jpg: for file in assets/img/**/*.jpg; do ./node_modules/.bin/cwebp -q 80 $file -o source/$file.webp -short; done;
scripts.webp:gif: for file in assets/img/**/*.gif; do gif2webp $file -o source/$file.webp; done;
scripts.webp: npm run webp:png & npm run webp:jpg & npm run webp:gif
scripts.build: npm run fonts & npm run images & npm run sass & npm run serviceWorker & npm run rollup && npm run webp
